citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_50f11bf2-c710-446c-8230-9ebbf6dcb2a3\", \"author\": [{\"given\": \"Brett\", \"family\": \"Johnson\"}, {\"given\": \"Brian\", \"family\": \"Hunt\"}, {\"given\": \"Tim van der\", \"family\": \"Stap\"}, {\"given\": \"Julian\", \"family\": \"Gan\"}, {\"given\": \"Sean\", \"family\": \"Godwin\"}, {\"given\": \"Martin\", \"family\": \"Krkosek\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2021\", \"01\", \"30\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Le Hakai Institute Juv\u00e9nile Salmon Program surveille les migrations de saumons juv\u00e9niles dans les \u00eeles Discovery et le d\u00e9troit de Johnstone en Colombie-Britannique, au Canada, depuis 2015 afin de comprendre comment les conditions oc\u00e9aniques v\u00e9cues par les saumons juv\u00e9niles durant leur migration marine pr\u00e9coce influent sur leur croissance, leur sant\u00e9 et finalement, la survie.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Programme du saumon juv\u00e9nile de l'Institut Hakai\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.cioospacific.ca/dataset/ca-cioos_50f11bf2-c710-446c-8230-9ebbf6dcb2a3?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_50f11bf2-c710-446c-8230-9ebbf6dcb2a3\", \"author\": [{\"given\": \"Brett\", \"family\": \"Johnson\"}, {\"given\": \"Brian\", \"family\": \"Hunt\"}, {\"given\": \"Tim van der\", \"family\": \"Stap\"}, {\"given\": \"Julian\", \"family\": \"Gan\"}, {\"given\": \"Sean\", \"family\": \"Godwin\"}, {\"given\": \"Martin\", \"family\": \"Krkosek\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2021\", \"01\", \"30\"]}], \"abstract\": \"The Hakai Institute Juvenile Salmon Program has been monitoring juvenile salmon migrations in the Discovery Islands and Johnstone Strait in British Columbia Canada, since 2015 to understand how ocean conditions experienced by juvenile salmon during their early marine migration impacts their growth, health and ultimately survival.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Hakai Institute Juvenile Salmon Program\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.cioospacific.ca/dataset/ca-cioos_50f11bf2-c710-446c-8230-9ebbf6dcb2a3?local=en\"}]

      			<mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">				
        				<gco:CharacterString>The Hakai Institute Juvenile Salmon Program has been monitoring juvenile salmon migrations in the Discovery Islands and Johnstone Strait in British Columbia Canada, since 2015 to understand how ocean conditions experienced by juvenile salmon during their early marine migration impacts their growth, health and ultimately survival.</gco:CharacterString>				
          				<lan:PT_FreeText>					
            					<lan:textGroup>						
              						<lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="#fr">Le Hakai Institute Juv√©nile Salmon Program surveille les migrations de saumons juv√©niles dans les √Æles Discovery et le d√©troit de Johnstone en Colombie-Britannique, au Canada, depuis 2015 afin de comprendre comment les conditions oc√©aniques v√©cues par les saumons juv√©niles durant leur migration marine pr√©coce influent sur leur croissance, leur sant√© et finalement, la survie.</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>						
            					</lan:textGroup>					
          				</lan:PT_FreeText>				
      			</mri:abstract>
